Text:
I remember getting the demo of this game on those old PC Gamer demo discs they would give out with the magazines. It was a good game for it's time, I remember.

By the way, not sure if anyone else is with me on this, but another game I'd love to try before I buy would be the original Rainbow Six from GoG.com. If you have it, that is. =P
Can't help you on that, sorry.  Never had the desire to play it...I don't like tactical shooters like that.  I'm sure you can find an ISO laying around somewhere though.

Thanks dANGER_boy. Bought I-War and the expansions when they first came out (back when you could buy games and they would be finished and almost bug-free). 

If it works I might shell out the 6 more dollars for win7x64 compatibility. We'll see :)
Another great GOG torrent, thanks! Works perfectly on 64-Bit Win 7.
